titleStmt.title: Annual Report, The Col. W. F. Cody ("Buffalo Bill") Historical Pictures Company, 1917

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Annual Report, The Col. W. F. Cody ("Buffalo Bill") Historical Pictures Company, 1917

div1.note: JAMES R. NOLAND, Secretary of State

N. B. — This blank must be signed in two places by the President and Secretary of the Company, and the Corporate seal attached thereto and acknowledged before a Notary Public. (See extracts of Act on back hereof.)
div1.head: ANNUAL REPORT
MISCELLANEOUS
div1.ab: (Foreign Domestic) Indicate if Foreign or Domestic by drawing line through word in bracket.

The Col. W. F. Cody-Historical Pictures Company
(Name of Corporation)
FIRST. Names of Officers and their several places of business.

list.item: First Vice-President W. F. Cody Estate
Secretary H. H. Tammen Asst. Sec., V. R. Day
Residence Denver, Colorado 1846 Park Ave., Chicago, Ill.
Business Address % Denver Post 521 First Natl. Bank Bldg. "
Manager or Superintendent V. R. Day
Business Address 521 First Natl. Bank Bldg., Chicago, Ill.

div1.ab: SECOND. Names of Directors or Trustees, with the residence and business address of each: same as all of above.
THIRD. Total amount of capital stock as fixed and determined by articles of incorporation and amendments thereto $ 10,000.00

list.item: Amount of increased capital stock, if any $ none
Date of amendment to increase capital stock --
Amount of decrease of capital stock, if any $ none
Date of amendment to decrease capital stock --
That portion of said capital stock represented by its corporate capital, property and assets located and employed in the State of Colorado $

div1.ab: FOURTH. The proportion of said stock actually paid in $ 10,000.00
FIFTH. Setting forth how the same was paid:
SIXTH. Amount of indebtedness at date of filing this report $ 27,500.00
SEVENTH. State whether or not engaged in actual operation within the State of Colorado: Have not been in operation for past two years in any part of the U. S.

EIGHTH. Such other information as will show with reasonable fullness and certainty the condition of real and personal property, and the financial condition of your company at the date of filing this report

The only evidence that can be furnished is the company's books and reports which are filed at 521 First National Bank, Bldg., Chicago, Ill. with the Treasurer, duplication of same with H. H. Tammen with the Denver Post, Denver, Colorado.
In Witness Whereof, The President of the said corporation has hereunto set his hand and caused the corporate seal to be affixed this 30th day of April A. D. 1917
CORPORATE SEAL
div1.closer:
Attest: H. H. Tammen
Secretary.
F. G. Bonfils
President.

div1.p: Before me, Elmer W Jones, a Notary Public in and for said County and State, personally appeared F G. Bonfils, President, and H H. Tammen, Secretary of The W F Cody Historical Picture Co personally known to me to be the persons whose names are subscribed to the foregoing annual report of said corporation, who each being first duly sworn, upon his oath deposes and says, each for himself and not one for the other, that he is the President and Secretary, respectively, of the said The W F Cody - Historical Picture_Co and that the facts thus set forth in said annual report are true, full and complete, and that they as such President and Secretary, respectively, of the said corporation, made, signed and delivered the said annual report in compliance with the statute in such case made and provided.
div1.ab: CORPORATE SEAL.
div1.closer:
F. G. Bonfils
President.
H H Tammen
Secretary.

postscript.ab: Subscribed and sworn to before me this 30th day of April,, A. D. 1917
My commission expires February 26-1918 A. D. 191_

figure.p: Elmer W. Jones City & County of Denver, Colo. NOTARY PUBLIC

div1.ab:
ENDORSED

OF

(Domestic)
Filed in the office of the Secretary of State, of the State of Colorado, on the 31 day of May A. D. 1917 at 1 o' clock P M.

Recorded in Book_Page_
JAMES R. NOLAND,
Secretary of State.
By Floyd Fairhurst
Deputy.
